message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with 3D human pose estimation from monocular images using Deep Convolutional Neural Networks (DCNNs). This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) domain. The paper also proposes an adversarial learning framework, which is a popular technique in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of a novel multi-source discriminator to distinguish the predicted 3D poses from the ground-truth is related to the field of graphics (cs.GR). Finally, the experiments involve the use of public benchmarks, which is related to multimedia (cs.MM).
